title: Tensei Shitara Yadoya no Musuko deshita: Inakagai de Nonbiri Slow-life o Okurou - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Beautiful Female Lead   Cooking   Familial Love   Famous Parents   Lazy Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Reincarnated in Another World   Younger Sisters
author: Renkinou   錬金王
description:
One day, Yadoya Kenta, who was working for a black company, dies of exhaution.

When he wakes up , he finds that he has been reincarnated not as a Hero in another world, but as Tori, the son of an inn-keeper in a rural town! This time he wants to work moderately and relax! Surrounded by a kind family and lively customers, the slow-life of an innkeeper's son begins!

This is a slow life story set in a country town. The Hero works reasonably hard.>
